mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Morris, Gouverneur, 1752-1816
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Convention has opened ports of French colonies to American ships; produce being imported or exported on these ships are subject only to the same duties on like articles in French ships; asks Delamotte to make this known in America and to forward a copy to Jefferson in Philadelphia.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Circular, 1793 February 21, Paris, [France] to Delamotte, n.p.
